NICE ONE!!!!!!  Easy to install Unrar those 5 files and play. don't forget to register it

iceman dude step by step...

1st

left double click on ResEvil 4.part01.rar (window opens)

then you drag and drop the folder to any place you wish...

go to this folder... ResEvil4 

once you are there, double click on

Start_Game-Install.bat

the intro appears (exit with ESC key)

game starts installing , be patience takes awhile...

once its finished you can click on game.exe and play the game... with all textatures and musix, but without vids!.... 

all these steps ive done in the background (except installing to the end, did that already a few times i know it works!) therefor all you have to do unrar , go to folder ResEvil4 and double click on the > Start_Game-Install.bat < and wait... intro exit esc key and wait... game starts with game.exe....

dont listen to that instructions coming upon people who didnt followed the instructions!!!... my little sister is able to install this...

happy gaming....

Special Info Note:

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of packed exe's (ToeD.exe)

as a lame virus, (coz it's the mostly byte by byte check error of 'em!.)

This is truly a false information!,  a so called false positive, you can read 

more about in your VirusTool-Manual or WebSite!.
